articles.title: 'Four civilians that are dead' - gunman kills at Tulsa hospital in new US mass shooting, say police - News24
articles.description: A gunman has killed at least four people at a hospital campus in Tulsa, Oklahoma, police said, the latest mass shooting to convulse America.
articles.content:
• A gunman shot dead four people at the St Francis Health System hospital in Oklahoma.
  • He was armed with a rifle and a handgun.
  • Police believe the shooter shot himself dead.
